short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Intelligent Business Network that revolutionizes the way of sharing, creating, and learning new ideas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best productivity network where you can manage your communications work team or your organization.

Contains the best productivity tools such as:

- Projects
- Tasks
- File Repository
- Calendar of Events

Likewise contains the best social features that enhance your communications team to generate new ideas and achieve the objectives:

- Wall Communications
- Likes and Publications Micro-Blog
- Internal Messaging
- Groups of Information

Remember Etnix is a network allowing you to connect your clients and suppliers in order to communicate and work together. The idea is that all communication from your team and your external contacts can be made from this application to take better control and achieve goals.

Take advantage of this application to the fullest and achieve your goals with your team. Available online http://www.etnix.com and IOS and Android mobile devices.
